original: intros H_coreflexive_R1 H_coreflexive_R2. unfold Coreflexive. intros [a|b] [a'|b'] H. - apply H_coreflexive_R1 in H. subst. reflexivity. - inversion H. - inversion H. - apply H_coreflexive_R2 in H. subst. reflexivity.
